snippet: Belgian David Goffin continued his giant-killing run at Indian Wells as he stormed into the last four of the BNP Paribas Open with a 7-6(4) 6-2 upset victory over 10th-seeded Croat Marin Cilic on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Belgian David Goffin continued his giant-killing run at Indian Wells as he stormed into the last four of the BNP Paribas Open with a 7-6(4) 6-2 upset victory over 10th-seeded Croat Marin Cilic on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Giant Killer Goffin Keeps Going at Indian Wells
headline.main: Giant Killer Goffin Keeps Going at Indian Wells
